entry.title: Notes on a JMLR Paper
entry.summary:
Numerical Anaylsis near Singularities in RBF Networks

The parameter space of most learning machines have singular regions where the Fisher information matrices degenerate.

  • A parameter space is the set of all possible combinations of values for all parameters in a model Source

  • A parameter differs from a variable in a …
entry.content:
Numerical Anaylsis near Singularities in RBF Networks

The parameter space of most learning machines have singular regions where the Fisher information matrices degenerate.

  • A parameter space is the set of all possible combinations of values for all parameters in a model Source

  • A parameter differs from a variable in a model is that they tend to represent inherent properties of a system. Source

entry.title: Hi, I'm Daniyal Ahmad, but people call me Donnie
entry.summary:
I want this to be a place for me to write "book reports" on textbook chapters and academic papers I read.

These articles will likely serve as a poor learning resource for others since their primary purpose is for me to learn through summarization.

Perhaps, these may whet the supposed …
entry.content:
I want this to be a place for me to write "book reports" on textbook chapters and academic papers I read.

These articles will likely serve as a poor learning resource for others since their primary purpose is for me to learn through summarization.

Perhaps, these may whet the supposed reader's appetite to read the primary sources.

Happy holidays! Donnie
